Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
public class TurnController extends Object
TurnController will handle the selection of the next turn phase by checking if all requirements to change phase are met

  • Method Details

    • nextPhase

      public PHASE nextPhase(PHASE currentPhase)
      Acts as an FSM by choosing the next phase based on the current one and checking if it's possible to move to the next one. If the requirements are not met the Controller will remain in its current phase
      Parameters:
      currentPhase - the current turn Phase
      Returns:
      the next turn phase

    • resetRound

      public void resetRound()
      After every turn some indicators must be reset in order to track the next Player's actions

      public void resetTurn()
      After every turn some indicators must be reset in order to track the next Player's actions
